author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Keytruda Monotherapy Met Primary Endpoint In Phase 3 Study, Significantly Improving OS As First-Line Therapy In Locally Advanced Or Metastatic NSCLC Patients Expressing PD-L1 In At Least 1 Pct Of Tumor Cells
text:
April 9 (Reuters) - Merck & Co Inc:
* KEYTRUDAÂ® (PEMBROLIZUMAB) MONOTHERAPY MET PRIMARY ENDPOINT IN PHASE 3 KEYNOTE-042 STUDY, SIGNIFICANTLY IMPROVING OS AS FIRST-LINE THERAPY IN LOCALLY ADVANCED OR METASTATIC NSCLC PATIENTS EXPRESSING PD-L1 IN AT LEAST 1 PERCENT OF TUMOR CELLS
* SAFETY PROFILE OF KEYTRUDA IN PHASE 3 TRIAL WAS CONSISTENT
* PHASE 3 KEYNOTE-042 TRIAL WILL CONTINUE TO EVALUATE PROGRESSION-FREE SURVIVAL (PFS), WHICH IS A SECONDARY ENDPOINT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
